packageName: Google Calendar, Task, Reminder, and Gmail Search and Gmail Notification Device
author: ritchierich
releaseNotes:
v3.5.4: Added Pushable Button capability to the GCal Switch driver to allow a refresh to be invoked from a HE Dashboard via push command.
v3.5.2-3: Fixed NullPointerException error when the title/subject of a Google item is blank.  Will now default to 'none' if one isn't set.
v3.5.1: Changed instructional verbiage based on community suggestions. Updated Gmail Notification Device section to use new table format for displaying existing devices and adding new ones. Create Notification Device button now displays after entering name and email address to reduce confusion
v3.5.0: Added support for Google Gmail: New Gmail Notification Device driver that allows Gmail messages to be sent from Hubitat and Gmail message search.
v3.4.2: Fixed an issue with additional action notifications duplicating notifications if an event attribute changed that wasn't part of the message.
v3.4.0-1: Added reminder notification option for calendar events.  Reminder value can also be used as a dynamic start offset as well.
v3.3.0: Added 'Include details from all matching items?' preference for Additional Actions Notifications, added calendar event description to the child GCal Switch, improved code to prevent errors during version upgrades and clicking done on the parent GCal Search app is no longer required.
v3.2.0:Added ability to dynamically control a defined list of switches from text within the Google Calendar event, task and reminder. For example: 'Turn off bedroom fan and turn on bedroom overhead lights, bedroom lamps, and bedroom tv' to turn off and on several switches, Added description text logging to child GCal switch, Additional error handling if OAuth hasn't been enabled on the parent GCal Search app

v3.1.0: MAJOR UPDATE please read upgrade instructions: https://github.com/HubitatCommunity/Google_Calendar_Search/blob/main/Upgrade_Instructions.md

* Complete rewrite of the OAuth code
* Extended search capabilities to also include Google Tasks and Google Reminders
* Child switch is now optional
* Added Additional Actions to invoke Notifications and run Rule Machine actions directly from a search trigger
